Message.Title: Paul Ryan advisor says for Cutting Social Security, 'Wealthy' Begins at $25K
Message.Msg: When You're Cutting Social Security, 'Wealthy' Begins at $25K, says Paul Ryan advisor Paul Ryan adviser Yuval Levin's says eliminate entirely the social security COA for the top 1/3 of SS recipients , cut it by half for the next 1/3, and leave it alone for the bottom 1/3. Funny how for income taxes the gop defines rich as an income of over $400k a year...... but when it comes to cutting social security..."Rich" starts at $25k year...jeez see the article in the NYT by a paul ryan adviser entitled: Old and Rich? Less Help for You
why are you so afraid, big pop?
